message:
Shibir thanks student segment for effectualizing the shutdowns:

Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir expressed heartfelt felicitations to the student section for having effectualized 4-day long shutdowns called in protest against the pre-designed rulings of the controversial ill-debated tribunal.

In a letter of felicitations, the Secretary-General of Bangladesh Islami Chhatrashibir Abdul Jabbar said, “I would like to heartily thank the students for successfully launching 4-day long shutdowns called protesting against the verdict of 90-year rigorous imprisonment to the former Chief of Bangladesh Jamaat-e-Islami Professor Golam Azam and the ruling of death penalty to Jamaat Secretary-General Ali Ahsan Muhammad Mujahid.”

He urged the students to effectualize any programs likely to be announced in the coming days.
